title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies: Simulation-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Learners in Managerial/Leadership Roles Perform Science Experiment Simulations in VR, with Periodic Cognitive Load Surveys Throughout the Course; Comprehensive Learning Outcomes Analyzed via Project-Based Assessments

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain intrinsic, extraneous, and germane cognitive loads occurring during simulation activities
Learners can quantitatively assess overall cognitive load levels using the 10-item Cognitive Load Inventory (CLI-10)
Learners can develop optimization strategies to adjust simulation difficulty based on cognitive load measurement results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
